Module count
Package count.gui

Class AnnotatedTableModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
count.gui.AnnotatedTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
HistoryModel
public class AnnotatedTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
Model for family table content. Columns are the following
  • 1 family name,
  • 2... x properties
  • x+1 number of lineages in which it is present
  • x+2 total number of members
  • x+3 .. members in each lineage (if detailed profiles)
  • x+3 profile summary
Helper classes include a renderer for phyletic profiles.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös csurosm@gmail.com
See Also:
